From alt.binaries.sounds.lossless.jazz and verified.
Bootleg info
A great live set from his Changes era mid-70s line-up. Excellent sound quality.

9 July, 1975
Postaula
Bremen, Germany

Source:Soundboard

Disc One (54:18):
01 - Sue's Changes - 32:52
02 - For Harry Carney - 13:12
03 - Free Cell Block F, 'Tis Nazi U.S.A. - 8:13

Disc Two (1:00:27):
01 - Black Bats And Poles - 11:39
02 - Fables Of Faubus - 15:31
03 - Duke Ellington's Sound Of Love - 13:09
04 - Theme - 1:45
05 - Remember Rockefeller At Attica - 9:36
06 - Devil Blues - 8:45

Musicians:
Jack Walrath - trumpet
George Adams - tenor saxophone
Don Pullen - piano
Charles Mingus - bass
Dannie Richmond - drums

Notes: This is widely circulated as coming from "Royal Hall, UCLA."
